item.description:
Ladies and Gentlemen,

Saturday was a lot of fun. I hope you can join us this Saturday for some more fun. All skill levels are welcome. If you just want to come out to stretch your legs, that is ok. Our goal is to have fun.

Please note that we will be playing at 3pm this Saturday.

From the redline, get off at the Alewife stop, then follow signs to Rindge Ave, cross the Alewife-Brook Pkwy and head to the area with stadium lights. We play on an awesome turf field.

-Frank
item.name: 3PM - TIME CHANGE - SAT - FLAG FOOTBALL
